source_objects.description: Learn how to decorate a cake, prepare a gourmet meal, identify different wine varietals and much more.

items.title: BBQ 101 - A Buyer's Guide
items.headline: When you are in the market to buy a BBQ (barbecue) grill for your family, this is all you need to know.
objectives_summary: The learners will gain the knowledge to make an informed decision when shopping for a bbq to save money and time.

items.title: Comfecto Pasta Making Class Mastery Program
items.headline: No time? No worry! Cook a 5-star pasta dish even if you only have instant pasta!
objectives_summary: Learn how to make quick and delicious pasta that taste like 5 stars gourmet at home in one pot!
To see how easy it is to make fresh pasta and amaze your friends and family!
To use the 'well method' for making pasta in one pot only

items.headline: Learn to cook easy and simplified Japanese dishes in the microwave - a great course for the busy papa as well as mama!
objectives_summary: Prepare delicious dinner at home without taking much time.
Enjoy homemade microwave cooked food.
Learn new Japanese recipes which the whole family can enjoy.

items.title: Easily cooking your favorite Thai food in immediately.
items.headline: Make your own dish traditional Thai food  with quickly steps, easy to understand and the amount of ingredients precisely
objectives_summary: Step by step to cook simple Thai food.
Easily cooking your favorite Thai food in immediately such as Thai Green curry with chicken, Spicy glass noodle salad and Stir fried crab with curry powder (Poo Padpongkaree)
How to use Asian herb condiments and to prepare everyday Thai home cooked easy recipes.

items.title: Plated Desserts Made Simple #2: Chocolate Cherry Mousse Bar
items.headline: Create stunning and delicious plated mousse desserts just like the pros, for your family, friends and customers!
objectives_summary: Create unique and exquisite plated mousse desserts, that are sure to wow your family, friends and customers.
Advance your career by learning many important recipes and sophisticated decoration skills.
Learn professional-level techniques and skills such as chocolate airbrushing.
